name: Maya G. Neytcheva
content: Maya Neytcheva Maya G. Neytcheva Present address: Department of Information Technology Uppsala University Box 337 SE-751 05 Uppsala, Sweden Mail to: maya dot neytcheva at it.uu.se CV Publications Projects Courses taught Local workshops Article in Research Media IT Home TDB-SciComp Some foto's Since 2002 I am the Associate Editor of the journal Numerical Linear Algebra with Applications NLA home page at Wiley Online Library Author Guidelines ! NLA style-files Earlier involvement: member of the Management Committee of the EU COST Action IC1305 Network for Sustainable Ultrascale Computing (NESUS) / EU site / Swedish site / act as a representative for Sweden and as the Coordinator of the Short Term Scientific Missions (STSM). member of the Management Committee of the EU COST Action IC0805 Open European Network for High Performance Computing on Complex Environments (ComplexHPC) (together with David Black-Schaffer ) (action closed: June 2013) ComplexHPC past activities: First Spring School, VU University, Amsterdam (May 9 - 13, 2011) Second Spring School, Uppsala University, IT Department (June 3 - 7, 2013) About COST framework NESUS and ComplexHPC are within the COST Domain Information and Communication Technologies (ICT) I strive to keep this page updated. Thank you for visiting it. Last changed on November 3, 2023 Mail to: Maya dot Neytcheva "at" it dot uu dot se "
